subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Froome, born in Kenya, emphasized Saturday evening that he was British, but a convincing case could be made Sunday that he was also the first African to win the Tour.
snippet: Froome, born in Kenya, emphasized Saturday evening that he was British, but a convincing case could be made Sunday that he was also the first African to win the Tour.
